items.name: Ewaso Eco-Lodge & Spa
items.short_description: A luxurious tented camp offering responsible tourism experiences along the Ewaso Ng'iro River, complete with a wilderness spa and stunning wildlife views.
items.address: Westgate Conservancy, along Ewaso Ng'iro River, Archers Post, Samburu County.

items.name: Samburu Heritage Village
items.short_description: Immerse yourself in the rich culture of the Samburu people through interactive exhibits, traditional dances, and authentic craft demonstrations in a community-run village.
items.address: Off Maralal-Baragoi Road, 15km North of Maralal, Samburu County.

items.name: Kalama Rhino Conservation & Education Centre
items.short_description: Discover the critical efforts to protect black rhinos at this new conservation centre. Learn about anti-poaching, habitat preservation, and get a chance to see these magnificent creatures from designated viewpoints.
items.address: Kalama Community Conservancy, 30km East of Archers Post, Samburu East, Samburu County.

items.name: Sarara Valley Panorama Point
items.short_description: Ascend to this newly established viewpoint offering breathtaking 360-degree vistas of the expansive Sarara Valley and the majestic Mathews Range. Guided nature walks available.
items.address: Near Namunyak Conservancy entrance, Wamba-Namunyak Road, Samburu North, Samburu County.

items.name: Ewaso River Kayak Adventures
items.short_description: Paddle along the calm stretches of the Ewaso Ng'iro River on a guided kayak tour, offering a unique perspective for birdwatching and spotting riverside wildlife like crocodiles and elephants.
items.address: River Camp, 5km South of Archers Post Town, Samburu East, Samburu County.

items.name: Samburu Star Dome Camp
items.short_description: Experience the wonders of the African night sky from transparent geodesic domes, offering an immersive stargazing experience guided by resident astronomers.
items.address: Remote plains, 20km North of Wamba, Samburu East, Samburu County.

items.name: Maralal Agro-Eco Farm & Training Centre
items.short_description: Explore sustainable farming practices adapted for arid regions, enjoy fresh farm-to-table meals, and participate in workshops on permaculture and water harvesting.
items.address: Off Maralal-Rumuruti Road, 7km South of Maralal Town, Samburu County.

items.name: Melako Birding Haven & Tower
items.short_description: A newly developed sanctuary and multi-tiered observation tower offering exceptional opportunities for birdwatchers to spot a rich diversity of species native to the arid savanna.
items.address: Melako Community Conservancy, 45km North of Laisamis (along A2), Samburu East, Samburu County.

items.name: Serian Springs Wellness Retreat
items.short_description: Tucked away around newly discovered warm mineral springs, this tranquil retreat offers natural therapies, traditional Samburu wellness practices, and serene natural surroundings for ultimate relaxation.
items.address: Off Isiolo-Marsabit Road (A2), near Samburu-Isiolo border, Samburu East, Samburu County.

items.name: Wamba Women's Artisan Centre
items.short_description: A vibrant hub celebrating Samburu craftsmanship, where local women create exquisite beadwork, traditional carvings, and textiles. Visitors can purchase unique souvenirs or join a hands-on workshop.
items.address: Wamba Town Centre, next to Local Market, Samburu East, Samburu County.
